post.body: for you, my dear, anything...i'll work on it. piano or guitar?
yes I can help! Send me your full name and date of order and I will investigate!
Just ate a Xmas cookie. But I went running this morning. I probably negated my entire caloric burn in the first bite of the snowman's head.
Went running and was hit in the head by an acorn. Should have stayed home and ate more cookies.
Merry Christmas everyone! And Happy Chanukkah! The final Hair Metal video is posted, Xmas gifts are opened....what now??
12 DAYS OF HAIR METAL - Day 11 - 'Every Rose Has Its Thorn' by POISON! - http://tinyurl.com/7cokgh. One day left!!!
12 DAYS OF HAIR METAL - Day 10 - Warrant's HEAVEN!! - http://tinyurl.com/9pht97
Met with @james_gunn & @yarvo to discuss our new show, baking more Christmas cookies & thinking about recording my album - we start on 1/6!!
12 DAYS OF HAIR METAL (Day 9 - Cinderella): http://tinyurl.com/97vjty. Three days left and I miss it already!!
Happy Chanukah everybody...the holiday of miracles, if you believe in that stuff. Maybe this year I'll believe & pray for something divine.
Just recognized at the mall by a guy who fell in love with a girl he met online who was apparently pretending to be me. What a weird story.
YouTube is having upload issues and Day 9 of Hair Metal might have to wait til tomorrow!! :(
12 DAYS OF HAIR METAL - Day 8 up now! - http://tinyurl.com/96evy3 - Oriental Beat by Hanoi Rocks!
Grateful to finally know my last five songs for 12 Days of Hair Metal. Now I can panic over the fact that I've not yet bought any xmas gifts
Happy that my brother @samenglebardt will be in LA for xmas. And that he doesn't hate me. Something about the holidays makes me paranoid.
helped wrap christmas presents for an adopted poor family. i'll be really bummed if my mom is wearing that sweater next time i see her.
Looking forward to tomorrow because it will no longer be today.
just watched @james_gunn's PEANUS (part 1): http://tinyurl.com/5x7m8l
CDs still available! Go here: http://tinyurl.com/3v3g82 & pick up your limited edition signed copy!!!
Can't wait to see @james_gunn's PEANUS! Details here: http://tinyurl.com/4yht75
